CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 15, 1959, pg. B 15, reads: "Junior Mothers Club - This charming group of young matrons are as pretty as the picture they make. Annual hostesses for the smart set each summer at a gay fete, the girls chose Luvola's Farm in suburbs this year.  The party was one of the year's most entertaining and informal dates.  Front row: Mmes. Alma Fox, Betty Tibbs, Jean Pendleton, Betty Watkins, Norma Malone and Phyllis Pitts.  Standing: Mmes. Mildred Britton, Bessie Paxton, Evelyn Anderson, June Stokes, Vivian Kizsie, Claudell Mull, Delores Taylor, Frances Nunn and Fredericka Fulwylie. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Junior Mothers club members wearing matching plaid skirts and light colored sleeveless blouses, squatting: Alma Speed Fox, Betty Tibbs, Jean Pendleton, Betty Watkins, Norma Malone, and Phyllis Pitts; and standing includes: Mildred Britton, Bessie Paxton, Evelyn Anderson, June Stokes, Vivian Kizsie, Claudell Mull, Dolores McCoy Taylor, Frances Bell Nunn and Fredericka Fulwylie, posed in front of light colored clapboard building, at Luvola's Farm, another version
